title: Huntress armor
summaries: Huntress armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total after defeating any mechanical boss, and provides summon as well as ranged damage bonuses. The set consists of the Huntress's Wig, Huntress's Jerkin, and Huntress's Pants.
A full set of Huntress armor provides the following stats:

• +36 defense
  • +20% ranged damage
  • +30% summon damage
  • +10% ranged critical strike chance
  • +20% movement speed
  • +10% ammo conservation
  • +2 sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the fire rate of <linked>Explosive Trap sentry summons</linked> and will cause their attacks to inflict the <linked>Oiled</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> for 4â€“8.5 seconds, making enemies take increased damage from <linked>On Fire!</linked>, <linked>Hellfire</linked>, <linked>Cursed Inferno</linked>, <linked>Frostburn</linked>, and <linked>Shadowflame</linked>.
The <linked>Red Riding armor</linked> can be considered a direct upgrade of the Huntress armor.

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of sentries
Explosive Traps recharge faster and oil enemies
Set oiled enemies on fire for extra damage
statistics.Buy: 45 [img:Defender Medal] (set)
statistics.Sell: 9 GC (set)
